summary: A concert inspired by the Coen Brothers' film, 'Inside Llewyn Davis,' which is set in the 1960s Greenwich Village folk music scene, featuring live performances of the film's music, as well ... See full summary Â»
cast: The Avett Brothers|Scott Avett|Seth Avett|Joan Baez|T Bone Burnett|Ethan Coen|Joel Coen|Rhiannon Giddens|Oscar Isaac|Lake Street Dive|David Mansfield|Colin Meloy|The Milk Carton Kids|Keb' Mo'|Marcus Mumford|Rachael Price|Punch Brothers|David Rawlings|Lillie Mae Rische|Patti Smith|Willie Watson|Gillian Welch|Jack White|Gabe Witcher
title: Another Day, Another Time: Celebrating the Music of Inside Llewyn Davis
